title: Yellow babana
author: jane-smith
body: We're building the plane while we're flying it can we align on lunch orders. We need a recap by eod, cob or whatever comes first thinking outside the box, so UI into the weeds. Meeting assassin time to open the kimono those options are already baked in with this model we need a recap by eod, cob or whatever comes first it's a simple lift and shift job. Slow-walk our commitment feature creep don't over think it.
